ygData.subject: Not your average Wolf
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m glad to see you ve done research, but a bot that turns into a wolf is far from average. his internal circuitry would make him heavier.

I'm glad to see you've done research, but a bot that turns into a 
wolf is far from average. his internal circuitry would make him 
heavier.
